pkgmetadata.longdescription: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024) // Provides the official administrative boundaries of the Azores (Regio Autnoma dos Aores (RAA)) as defined in the 2024 edition of the Carta Administrativa Oficial de Portugal (CAOP), published by the Direo-Geral do Territrio (DGT). The package includes convenience functions to import these boundaries as 'sf' objects for spatial analysis in R. Source: https://geo2.dgterritorio.gov.pt/caop/CAOP_RAA_2024-gpkg.zip.
